avdta.demand

Class DynamicODTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.demand.DynamicODTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<DynamicODRecord>

    public class DynamicODTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<DynamicODRecord>
    This class provides an interface for modifying and printing the dynamic OD and static OD tables. Note that the class references assignment intervals in the project's demand profile table (see DemandProfile).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicODTable()
      Constructs an empty dynamic OD table.
      DynamicODTable(DemandProject project)
      Reads in the dynamic OD table from the specified project (see DemandProject.getDynamicODFile()).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds the specified DynamicODRecord to the table.

      Adds the specified amount of demand.
      void addDemand(VehicleRecord trip, DemandProfile profile)
      Adds the specified VehicleRecord: calls addDemand(int, int, int, int, double) with the appropriate parameters.
      void addDemand(Zone origin, Zone dest, int ast, int type, double dem)
      Adds the specified amount of demand.
      void clear()
      Empties all entries in this dynamic OD table.
      int getMaxAST() 
      double getTrips(int origin, int dest, int type)
      Returns the number of trips for the specified parameters, aggregating over assignment intervals
      double getTrips(int origin, int dest, int ast, int type)
      Returns the number of trips for the specified parameters.
      double getTrips(Node origin, Node dest, int type)
      Returns the number of trips for the specified parameters, aggregating over assignment intervals

      Returns the number of trips for the specified parameters.
      boolean isEmpty() 
      java.util.Iterator<DynamicODRecord> iterator() 
      void printDynamicOD(DemandProject project)
      Prints the dynamic OD table to the specified project (see DemandProject.getDynamicODFile()).
      void printStaticOD(DemandProject project)
      Prints the static OD file for the specified project by aggregating over assignment intervals (see DemandProject.getStaticODFile()).
